website_summaries.verdict: Offers solid technology, but it's not for all types of hair and requires close adherence to instructions.
pros: A trusted brand that offers state-of-the-art IPL technology
Capable of permanently removing hairs within four weeks when instructions are followed
cons: Not very effective on very light or red hair
Some owners report irritated skin following treatments

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS BEFORE BUYING!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fantastic product, HOWEVER, it is listed as having 300,000 flashes in the title and on the box in the photos but when you read the description it says the product has 120,000 flashes. When I received mine I noticed that the box says that it only has 120,000 flashes. Again it’s a great product but it won’t last half as long as you would expect it to so you’re basically getting less than half what you paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Camillia

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: According to the chart and says my skin works, however when I got it and tried using it, it didn’t work. Then I tried returning it and the return shippinent would cost $200 and some change. I had a bad experience with this order
customer_reviews.author: Suely

customer_reviews.title: You must have to be albino to use this
customer_reviews.text: I an a skin tone 2-3 and the red light came on telling me that I'm too dark. This little gadget of infinite uselessness would fire on the underskin of my arms but not the tops... so I'd be some hairy person with vertical stripes of hair! A complete fashion faux pas for yetis the world around. Didn't dare try it on my legs or um.. elsewhere. Good thing I discovered this depressing flaw in marketing materials gone wrong early so that I didn't suffer more disappointment later. So long venus, I'm sending you back to Uranus.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Shumar

customer_reviews.title: a bandaid for ladies with fast growing hair
customer_reviews.text: What this product did do: it slowed down my hair growth while I was treating. For example, normally my hair grows so fast I could shave in the morning but did not want anyone to see or feel my 2:00 shadow -I'd have to shave in the afternoon as well. This device allowed me to go a few days without prickly shadow. What it did not do: it did not kill my hair. I'm going back to my epilating tweezers. At least the roots are ripped out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Earthstar

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, if you have light skinand dark haire get it! its working!
customer_reviews.text: not sure how there are not more raving about this... it is actually working! at first when I just got it I targeted a few hairs that were really bugging me growing in the wrong place, after a few weeks of using it once week they were gone, the way it works the hair kind of grows out and if you pull on it gently it just comes out and done... after that i started using it in larger areas, it doesn't make everything completely gone but whatever grows back grows much slower and thinner Love it totally worth the investment!!
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I've seen drastic reduction in hair after 5 uses on the highest setting! Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: ata0318

customer_reviews.title: Not working for hormonal facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes. I really did. But it has done nothing for my hormonal facial hair. No reduction, no finer appearance, everything is just the way it was after 9 uses. It may work better on legs or arms but face, nope. Machine is easy to use and doesn’t take long and the pain is like a 2-3 on a scale of 1-10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am asian with brown skin, and it works on my skin. At first, i'm hesitant to buy this thinking that it will not work on me because of my skintone, but i still bought it anyway, and it did what is says it will do, hair removal. I did my legs and underarms, and i saw results that hair growth slows down until it stops growing. I did like once a week laser. There's a tingling sensation, but bearable. It's a lot of work though, compare to shaving. But skin is better.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieline dela cruz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as described
customer_reviews.text: This has not been working for me, and I have used it once per week for the past 3 months- even though it says after 2 months you can knock it down to once a month. However, my hair is still growing back as it normally would. I do not shave in between sessions- only once a week on the day I am going to use the product. I have fair skin and dark hair which is supposed to be the correct combination for this product. I was super excited for this, now sad I wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: completely ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I used the product exactly as described, and it did not work AT ALL! in fact, my hair growth is worse than it was prior to me using the machine. I looked this up, and it's called villus growth--be very careful because the treatment itself may backfire and worsen your hair issue.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of mi life!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it. I was hesitant about spending 300 dls for something that might not worked since In the past I spent a lot of money in Laser cliniques (twice) with no good results and ever since I started using this, I noticed results form day 1. It’s been 4 months and my legs are almost hair free. Recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: No effect on me
customer_reviews.text: product seems to be functioning properly, is ergonomic and easy to use. However, for me at least, it hasn't done anything noticeable after using it for 10 months. If anything I think my hair has actually gotten thicker, darker, and fuller. But even if it worked exactly as the company describes (permanent reduction in hair regrowth), honestly an epilator is still a better approach, and much cheaper. Because really this product doesn't get rid of hair, it's meant to reduce regrowth. which is really not what I want. I want the hair gone.
customer_reviews.author: J_schuu

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Reduced Significantly My Hair growth over my legs. However for bests result instead of using the shaving Gilette provided I found better to use the 'Veet for Men' Cream which make the hair come off in 4 to 6 minutes. The Best time to re-use is to let the hair e grow a little 3 to 4 weeks depending on your re-growth time span and re-use. One Draw back I found out myself when using the Gilette is that It was creating me spots all over my legs. I personally was never into shaving but nowadays I started going GYM and it helped my confidence. so It was a nice purchase for me after all.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I was very skeptical to spend so much money on it, but it was very worth it. I was always self conscious of my hair growing so fast, and I would have very noticeable stubble even hours after shaving. I have done 4 treatments so far, and I can already tell a huge difference. The hair still grows, by it grows much slower and less hairs grow. My legs are now smooth for days before they get stubble. I am so much more confident with my legs now.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I am happy to report
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to report, I have notice a BIG DIFFERENCE! The facial hair, was the most effective area( chin cheeks) I believe it's because the hair is not as course via stronger. I did have to use tweezers for those stubborn thicker hairs. As for my lady parts, noticeable difference, still have work to do! The more the skin is loose, you will feel it more⬇️ Like under the arms isn't bad. But pass the bikini line.... ouch! But it's manageable. My fav is that you can just hold down the button and keep going!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS VERY EASY TO USE, THE ONLY PROBLEM WITH IT IS THAT I BOUGHT IT AS A GIFT FOR A FRIEND AND HER SKIN COLOR IS A LITTLE TOASTY AND IT DID NOT WORK FOR HER AT ALL. THIS PRODUCT WORKS GREAT IF YOU HAVE WHITE WHITE WHITE SKIN.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Reduced not eliminated hair. Still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: First, I am the ideal candidate for this (fair skin, dark hair). I’ve only done about 8 rounds so far and no my hair is not eliminated but it is very slow growing back compared to before I started. I used to shave my legs and then within the hour have stubble, now I can get a two to three days out of it. My sister had it professionally done and has similar results so I would say it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not permanent.
customer_reviews.text: Less hair when used constantly but not permanent. Hair came back like it was never used. I notice less razor burn when using it though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for two weeks now and I haven’t seen any results yet but it’s still too soon! I’ll update my review later but I just wanted to say that I ordered this and the seller upgraded my order to a newer model and included the Braun facial cleaning brush! Worth $150 I couldn’t be more pleased! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Naydana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple months and I absolutely love it, as long as you use as directed it really works, some parts of the body better than others. With my my legs lasts a longer time hair free and my under arms as well, but face and private areas not as much. But I have seen tremendous improvement on my facial hair growth especially because I have PCOS so I love this!
customer_reviews.author: mine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product certainly helped reduce the timing of my hair growth and it also made my hair a lot more fine, which was useful in allotting time for the hair to grow back before having to shave again. It was not very noticeable. The only problem I found was that the machine would not work on certain parts of my body due to hyper pigments, even though I’m not very dark-skinned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my skin. Despite being on lighter end of brown and definitely within the color spectrum that the manufacturer states this device works on, it did not allow me to use it, even on my lightest (basically light beige - tan) skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results !
customer_reviews.text: I only used this for 3 times and I can see a major difference in hair growth and reduction !! Can't wait to continue using this ! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I only used this for my armpits, my skin is pretty white and I have dark brown hair. Even though this is supposed to work for my skin and hair type, I don’t see major results after using it consistently for 4 months. The hair only partially got removed and also after a while it starts growing again. I‘m pretty disappointed and will most likely return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Kutscherauer

customer_reviews.title: I have fair skin it doesn’t work unless you are super white
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying it apparently you have to have a super white skin, not good and I’m pretty fair skin it does not work do not buy unless you are super white skin, it didn’t light up for me to try is a wast of money
customer_reviews.author: marisa f.

customer_reviews.title: Not a permanent solution
customer_reviews.text: This is not a permanent solution. The hair still grows back but slower and I still have to shave after months of using it. I definitely won't waste money buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Added permanent skin discoloration
customer_reviews.text: title says most of my complaint, it also made hair darker but it did reduce growth a bit. Would never recommend ever though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Chinese Product
customer_reviews.text: Received Chinese product written in Chinese, not sure if it’s the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Vy tran

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for dark hair, olive skin! Two months of weekly use and it won’t be long before I am hair free!! It’s a slow process but worth every cent! The hair growth process slows down and the more stubborn areas I hit up twice a week to aid in a quicker result. It’s working and i am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: LAURA L.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works really good! it doesn't hurt at all like other brand (like the one my mom has). I used every week, only down side is it takes some time to do large areas
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: This product has been a game changer for me! ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a game changer for me! From literally having to shave everyday to twice a week and I'm only five weeks into my treatment! Worth the money to not have to invest in razors!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work too late to get a refund
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work and by the time you’ve given it a chance to work it’s too late to return it! A lot of money for zero results!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didnt really help
customer_reviews.text: It barely made a difference. I shaved before every use and did it once a week for a few months. I barely notice a difference. I still have to shave every couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good ipl.
customer_reviews.text: just follow manual guide. around 2-3 months depend with which area. then repeat 1 time/month. but new hairs grow up slow and still same not thin.
customer_reviews.author: nightskyman

customer_reviews.title: Its stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Sensor is too sensitive and now its stopped working . Because of that we cant use this anymore
customer_reviews.author: Irshad

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with eye protection and works great. Very happy and will recommend to others. I use it in face, arms, and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly M.

customer_reviews.title: Product would be a great buy if it didn’t break.
customer_reviews.text: Although the product did work , it broke inside of a month. The button that activated the flash broke and wouldn’t function anymore. Used maybe 3 or 4 times/sessions broke and n the middle of last use. I would buy again buy kinda weary that it will break again after the 30 day return limit.
customer_reviews.author: Timdavis

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold while using at certain angles.
customer_reviews.text: When using you have to let it cool down in between using on different parts of the body. Also button to adjust power is to close to the on button. Have lowered power on occasion when using the on button. Don't know if it works yet, have only used for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr John A. Tafel

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Hardly any hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. It took about 3-4 treatments to see a dramatic difference!! Love this! I am only 6 weeks in and the hair barely grows. Minimal discomfort. This is of my bikini area and the pic shows after a 1 week period... barely any hairnet growth! 😮
customer_reviews.author: A^^***

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I have used it everywhere from my face to my legs. I could see results after one use. If used correctly it is a great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: You have to have it
customer_reviews.text: You can see the result after 3 times traetment. It can significantly reduce hair growing but be patient and keep doing routnily
customer_reviews.author: rosa

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product now for a while - works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Josy

customer_reviews.title: Has slowed growth but still early
customer_reviews.text: The verdict is still out on this. Bought at the end of January. Have used about 7 or 8 times now. I am blonde and trying this on my armpits, legs and arms. I have some hair that is dark and some that is not so I don’t expect full results but am hoping that it will let me cut down on my shaving significantly going forward. I can tell that some of the growth has slowed in some areas. Will give it another month or so of treatments to see what the results are as I know it takes time.
customer_reviews.author: LSTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bought the eye protection glasses as well
customer_reviews.text: THIS THING IS AMAZING!!! I have only used it 4 times and my underarm hair is virtually gone!,, my leg hair is significantly less, LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: goldie hofmaier

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. This works best for fair skin and dark hair. Not very effective for me
customer_reviews.author: BALAJI TEJA S

customer_reviews.title: 100% great
customer_reviews.text: After 4 weeks using it, you can see results. It is more than perfect! 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: FABIANA ROCHE

customer_reviews.title: Only worked once !
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once. The second time I tried to use it it just shut down !!! Didn’t turn on. Super disappointed. Also the box it came in was not in English.

customer_reviews.title: Works, but be patient
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for about 6 months. It took weekly uses for 2 months before there was a noticeable difference. I still have to shave my legs about once a week, but regrowth is slow and more fine. I have PCOS, so facial hair has been much more stubborn, but it's about 70% gone at this point. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: It's doesn't work properly. The shipment came very quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: It's doesn't work properly. The shipment came very quickly from USA to Canada in 2 days. But I tried it sometimes it works sometimes gives red indicator.
customer_reviews.author: Moataz Youssef

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't work in my plugs and wouldn't turn on when I finally found an outlet that would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked! The light is bright and they don't have glasses so you really have to try to look away.
customer_reviews.author: xlinhduhx

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have 2 years using and work very well
customer_reviews.author: Jakeline Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Worked as promised
customer_reviews.text: Worked as promised at an unbelievable discount from salon prices!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have discovered this system before I wasted money on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Darya K.

customer_reviews.title: Not solving the purpose
customer_reviews.text: We don’t like this product. It’s not at all effective.
customer_reviews.author: Pady

customer_reviews.title: My fiance uses this once a week for last 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiance uses this once a week for last 2 months, she has very fair skin and has used this on her face, neck, legs, underarms and carefully around nipples. She has seen a noticeable reduction in hair growth. She has been taking DHEA vitamins to help us get pregnant which increases facial hair which is why she chose to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: A worthy investment
customer_reviews.text: This product is really helpful. It works well in hair reduction and is easy to use. I bought this in February of 2017 and it's still working great. I'm even helping my boyfriend reduce the hair on his back with it. You'd spend a lot more at med spas then the overall investment of this machine. And the best part is you have control.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing results. The literature says to give this treatment 3 months. The problem is, after 3 months you can no longer return this to amazon. I really don’t see much of a change and I have been using twice a week . Feel I got better results from waxing. Save your $$$
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Wassenaar

customer_reviews.title: This device is amazing!! I have light skin and thick
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing!! I have light skin and thick, dark hair. I have used this product 3 times to date and notice a HUGE difference. I’m that person that would shave her legs and underarms and would have stubble in less than 24 hours. I only used this product 3 times, it’s been 4 days since I had shaved, and I have barely any hair growth. I am blown away how well this product is working. I am beyond happy I bought this. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband bought me this for my birthday, we ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this for my birthday, we share this account. I used to get professional last removal treatments and this product hurts way less. I have used it for the sessions full body and I've gone from shaving daily to being able to go three to four days without any noticable hair on my arms, armpits and legs! It also barely stings and it only stings on more sensitive areas of the body.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I have already seen results after just 3 uses! I have used it once a week for three weeks and I already have reduced and eliminated hair growth! I am someone that has dark and coarse hair that grows very quickly. I have had professional laser hair removal done on my legs and I have to say that I love using the Venus laser at home SO much more than going to appointments. I really didn’t know if this product would work, but I am very satisfied and already feel that it was worth the investment. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery I used it once but it seems nice I have to wait long time to review the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery I used it once but it seems nice very effective product My comment only that i recived the device with no pluge head ( so i coudnt use it till i bought one )
customer_reviews.author: Marwa

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! 4 treatments and no more hair. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: E2Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 6 months and have had great results. It is very time consuming on your legs but fine for smaller areas. I have fair skin and dark hair, and have been using it on my face, tummy, underarms and legs. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I've used this consistently once a week for 7 weeks and am so happy with the results! I was embarrassed and annoyed with my body hair and this laser is changing my life so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Monika Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great, but you have to continue to use it monthly, or else the results reverse.
customer_reviews.author: samantha cassady

customer_reviews.title: Braun Gillette Venus
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 4 weeks and I can already see a reduction in hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadine72

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought this epilator a long time ago. I have used it once a week, according to the manual. With a month and a half of use, the results are already great! Few hairs left ... I do not feel any pain and my skin does not turn red. I have fair skin and black hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, great price, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Only did one treatment so far and I can see that there is less hair and it’s growing slower. (I have dark thick hair).
customer_reviews.author: Mor H.

customer_reviews.title: This product is the best 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: if it works on me it works on anyone. believe me my hairs are horrible. This product is the best 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Robledo

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I’ve made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made. Have been using it for about 8 weeks and see a huge difference in hair growth!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Simply didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It simply didn't work for me. Tried few weeks following the instruction, but nothing changed.
customer_reviews.author: Vincy

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions are Mostly Everything
customer_reviews.text: Box looked like it had already been opened, a single piece of boxing tape was holding the box shut. Perhaps a return from another customer? Perhaps a curious postal worker? Hopefully it works better than the state it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rice

customer_reviews.title: Misleading manual guide
customer_reviews.text: Product description is misleading. The manual guide says "The power supply is universal and will work with all commonly encountered main supplies." I can't even use it as the power cord is incompatible in Malaysia.
customer_reviews.author: Lilo

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing for me... What a disappointment... An expensive mistake...
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing for me... What a disappointment... An expensive mistake...
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return this on last day for window and was denied. Do not purchase unless you absolutely want to pay this price and cannot return in a reasonable time. Sadly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne A. Matheson

customer_reviews.title: It's a USED item Am so disappointed, yesterday received the item open box
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY IT! It's a USED item Am so disappointed, yesterday received the item open box, looks like a used one!!!!!! What if I used it and got a skin infection or a cancer due to virus, what about hygiene issues... please be careful
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed almousawi

customer_reviews.title: This product is not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My light skin mixed girlfriend Put it up to her skin and it said that she was too dark to use it I did not realize that you had to have a Fair skin complexion Or it could put Blatches on your skin... so now she has a bush on her chin and the cat plays with it when she sleeps....
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!  Does not work, broke in 5 uses, lasted less than 30  days!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of stuff on Amazon, and I NEVER leave reviews. So that should say something about how completely unsatisfactory this product is. I used it 5 times. I have very fair skin, and dark hair. I saw no results. ZERO. Then, after owning it for 30 days, the light went out. Dead. Kaput. The tool was not dropped, or used incorrectly. It just died. This thing costs too much to work this badly and break this soon. I'd give it 0 stars if that were an option. Fortunately, Amazon was kind enough to take it back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not for long...
customer_reviews.text: It works!! Huge reduction of hair growth in four months. But it's completely stopped working now. It won't even turn on. It's only been 4 months. I didn't spend almost $300 for a device I can't use more than a few months. I used it on my legs, forearms, underarms, and upper lip. So I did use it alot, but still...
customer_reviews.author: ShanBoughtThis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. I have been using it for a month and I am completely impressed with how well this has worked. I had purchased and used the Tria device years ago and was completely disappointed in it. It never worked at all for me. I was very reluctant to try this type of device again, but can honestly say it is very much worth the money. I have even recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: J Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It's still early days and I will post the 12 week results I am disappointed that I cannot get my upper lip on underlip ...
customer_reviews.text: I am off Pakistani origin with brown skin. So far 3 treatments and have not seen much of a difference. I have had yag laser treatment in past but was not very effective and I was dumping a lot of money. I am sick of threading and thought home ipl may be for me. It's still early days and I will post the 12 week results I am disappointed that I cannot get my upper lip on underlip area. These are my two most bothersome areas and the device will not fire. I guess if they had a small window attachment it may have helped. Thus the 3 stars. I'll wait to see how my legs and sideburns do.
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: This works for me
customer_reviews.text: I hate shaving. Since I have dark hair and fair skin, IPL treatments work great for me. I have a few tattoos that I'll always have to shave, but this will help me either not have to shave at all or at least not very often. It's slightly uncomfortable, but not painful at all. I had professional IPL in some areas in the past, and this seems to work just as well. It also helps to take care of the spots that the professional IPL missed and I never went back to get treated. All for a lot less money than I spent on professional treatments.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruff

customer_reviews.title: Not for men who are active outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I have had successful professional laser hair removal. So I was surprised that this device wouldn't activate on any part of my body. (I get the "red light" saying my skin color is wrong.) I am a white guy of English ancestry. However, I am outdoors a lot, biking, surfing, etc. I guess my skin has tanned to the point where it won't work. (According to their "color chart", I should be a candidate for use.)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Sensors stopped working/device will not fire
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of 2017 as a 40th birthday present for myself. I am extremely fair, with brown hair -- so the ideal candidate. Initially, it seemed to work well. I was not great about maintenance, so I will not blame any regrowth on the product. As the product has aged, no matter how the device is positioned on my face, the sensor is not picking it up. All I see are the red lines/it won't trigger the flash. I would get it repaired, but how much will a repair cost, anyway? And the website is not helpful. If you're going to play the IPL game, try a less expensive route.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used it about five times now and it definitely weakened my chest hair and if i keep using it weekly i will.defenitly be expecting no hair. Right now my hair is growing patchy and it makes alot of difference for me I'm a hairy guy and i have thick black chest hair. I haven't seen big difference in my pubic hair area but definitely a little bit weaker hair. I'm happy with it. It doesn't hurt almost at all and takes me 15 minutes to do chest and pubic area.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Out of nowhere stopped working! What on earth?? Do not buy this product! Only a 30 day return window and after six treatments just stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Monica B. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Save ur money and buy different one.
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if there’s any warranty on this product??! Mine stopped working since Nov 2019. Plus I didn’t see any results, so don’t bother buying this one, save your money for something better. I used it for two years but didn’t see any results. Just a waist of money, time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Ola

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I don't have to shave as often. Really works if you are willing to stick with it as recommended. I have medium to dark skin and dark hair, so it was perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine about 3 months now. I have very dark course hair that dries quickly and it has worked AMAZING. Would recommend to anyone wanting a permanent hair removal solution before going to a salon. Simple and pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Metty

customer_reviews.title: NOT PERMANENT
customer_reviews.text: Before purchase, you must know this is not permanent hair removal. It is quite nice while you are using it because hair stops growing so you don't have to shave. It also slows the growth after stopping using it, but eventually hair will grow back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a waste of time & money
customer_reviews.text: I used this once a week exactly as directed for 3 months. I saw a slight reduction in hair while using it, however after skipping 2 weeks I feel there is no longer any reduction of hair. This is more time consuming than shaving and doesn't last much longer than a shave. Unfortunately the return timeframe they allow is just a few weeks after purchase, leaving you no time to actually see if it works. Not worth the expensive price. I wish I could return it since I got no results.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Naturally lighter hair?  Forget it.
customer_reviews.text: If you have anything other than really naturally dark hair near the follicle, it doesn’t work. It’s REALLY expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Engiv8or

customer_reviews.title: After 2 months use, I can notice a few ...
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months use, I can notice a few patches where leg hair isn't regrowing as thickly. I have coarse black hairs, but maybe I haven't been moving it slowly enough as per directions
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Been using it since September 2018. Hair on my face, arms, and legs are all gone. It took a few applications.
customer_reviews.author: cparraz

customer_reviews.title: My wife used this for a month before it stopped ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife used this for a month before it stopped working, she barely used this for more than 5 times. Braun got to up their QC inspection! Frustrating that I have to send this back!
customer_reviews.author: Loh Junli

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my teenage daughter.
customer_reviews.text: This product really works! I bought it for my teenage daughter. She has been using it on her armpit hair for the past 6weeks and her hair hasn’t grown much and few she had are gone. This product really works!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seriously works
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I've been using it only about 9-10 weeks and most of my leg hair has stopped growing. What still grows is so thin and light that you can barely see it. I have fair skin and dark leg hair, so based on the product directions I am the ideal human for using this product. While you do not need to wear protective eyewear, if you stare at the device while it is flashing, you will definitely hurt your eyes. Don't be dumb, look away from it when it flashes or hold your other hand over it to block the flash.
customer_reviews.author: tikimonkey

customer_reviews.title: Dream come true
customer_reviews.text: I have hirrutism (extra hair growth) from a medical condition I was born w. I've struggled for 15 years to pluck, wax and shave the unsightly hair, especially on my upper lip and chin. I've used this device six times, just on my face now. Im so happy to say it has been successful at slowing the growth and or preventing it entirely in some places. I literally only have to pluck the day of my treatment. I used to pluck every other day, and that really irritated my skin. I now have a boost in confidence. What an incredible machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Thanks, Braun Gillette for a wonderful product, and thanks Amazon for a wonderful price!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the cheap-out alternative first.... don't waste your time. This machine is worth every penny. It gets the job done FAST. I am very impressed. Glide mode and the sensor are both great. I had no trouble with lips and chin, you just have to relax your skin (and I suppose since I'm older it's relaxed without my help LOL). I'm just so glad I found this in time to remove these hairs before they turn gray ! Thanks, Braun Gillette for a wonderful product, and thanks Amazon for a wonderful price!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

product_meta.title: Braun Gillette Venus Silk-Expert IPL 5001 Intense Pulsed Light, 300,000 Flashes, Face & Body Hair Removal System with Razor
product_meta.description: Venus Silk expert is a ground-breaking IPL system, which results in permanent hair reduction in as little as four treatments. It works beneath the skin's surface by targeting the melanin in the hair follicle, helping to break the cycle of hair regrowth. With continued, regular use, it helps prevent unwanted hair from reaching the skin surface. Skin tone varies across different parts of the body, with each tone requiring a specific energy level to target the melanin. Only Venus Silk-expert has the unique SensoAdapt skin tone sensor that continuously reads your skin tone 80x per second and automatically adapts the light intensity for best efficacy and safety. This removes the guesswork of having to match your skin tone against the complicated color matching charts other devices require. Power source 110 to 240v Mains ( It comes officially with a 220V UK EU cable. Local plug is provided inside the box as extra. Machine itself is 110 to 240v can be used anywhere in the world ). This model is same as Braun Silk expert 5 IPL BD 5006 but it has Gillette Venus razor only. Braun BD 5006 has pouch too.
feature_bullets: Inspired by professional salons, Venus Silk-expert Intense Pulsed Light (IPL) is clinically tested for permanent hair reduction

The safest IPL technology: the unique Senso Adapt skin tone sensor always ensures the right light intensity, for the safest, most effective treatment.Venus Silk-expert 5 IPL, powered by Braun, provides fast treatments suitable for large body parts such as legs or arms, which can be treated in 8 minutes, without compromising on effectiveness
The fastest IPL technology allowing you to treat a leg or arm in just 8 minutes, without compromising on effectiveness
94% of women experienced noticeable results after just 3 months. 89% of women experienced noticeable visible hair reduction, even 12 months after the last treatment
No hidden costs for gels, replacement cartridges or safety glasses. The device is safe and clinically tested for use without glasses
For use on face and body, with 300,000 flashes
